titles.title: A resolution honoring the life of and expressing the condolences of the Senate on the passing of Dr. Richard Errett Smalley.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 11/2/2005--Passed Senate without amendment. Declares that the Senate honors the life and accomplishments of Dr. Richard Errett Smalley, a recipient of the Nobel Prize in Chemistry, and expresses its condolences on his passing.
